title: Salt of the rift recruiting

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
hello everyone my mates and I recently started a club called salt of the rift as many players in oce are salty alone we decided to create a salt free club for anyone to join we sometimes do have teams playing in ranked or if you just want to muck around in a 5 man for norms go for it. 
beware anyone willing to join can be banned instantly if they be over the top or rude to another member of the channel we want a clean channel and showing others respect will grant you the same respect. 
we also have a few new streamers starting to stream soon. so you may be apart of some of these.
but anyone can join feel welcome. https://discord.gg/SetxHts
